get_btn <- function(Label,t1){
  qwer <- paste0(
  '
    <script>
      function btn(sample,s2){
        Swal.fire({
          title: s2,
          html: sample,
          
          confirmButtonText: ',"'","   ","'",'
        })

      }
    </script>
    
    <body>
      <button
      style="color: gold;
             background:black;
             font-size:1.3em;
             border-radius:0.5em;
             padding:5px 20px;"
      onclick="javascript:btn(',"'",t1[1],"'",",'",Label,"'",' )">',
      Label,'
      </button>
    </body>
  '
  )
  cat(qwer)
}


dat <- read.csv("./data.csv",header = T)

pos <- which(dat[,1]!="")
len <- length(pos)
pos2 <- pos-1
pos2 <- pos2[-1]
pos2 <- c(pos2,pos[len])

dd <- matrix("",nrow=len,ncol=2)
for(i in 1:len){
  dd[i,] <- c(dat[pos[i],1],
              paste0(dat[pos[i]:pos2[i],2],sep="<br>",collapse=""))
}

for(i in 1:len){
  get_btn(dd[i,1],dd[i,2])
}
